ai-tika-s0304t5:1_0: Proclaiming in the first jhāna, etc.
ai-tika-s0304t5:2_1: For the five hindrances attend to sensual pleasures among the senses, malicious perceptions, and attentions as they are, and so the five hindrances are said to be the “perceptions of ill will” .
ai-tika-s0304t5:2_2: For the hindrances are the hindrances, that is to say, sense desires.
ai-tika-s0304t5:2_3: And here there should be understood that the five hindrances should be understood here.
ai-tika-s0304t5:2_4: she attended on her with the Elder Mahā Moggallāna’s attendant a leaf hut.
ai-tika-s0304t5:2_5: Hence it is said: “He is a nephew.”
ai-tika-s0304t5:2_7: From here the rest comes, without developing the other state (of existence).
ai-tika-s0304t5:3_0: The expression of the first jhāna is finished.
ai-tika-s0304t5:5_0: the concentration through insight is the path, but not the fruition of concentration.
ai-tika-s0304t5:5_1: Because of the act of spending the safeguard, they do not reach absorption.
ai-tika-s0304t5:5_2: supporting things, seeing rise and fall.
ai-tika-s0304t5:5_3: (but) as a plastered field she was not able to go away,
ai-tika-s0304t5:5_4: The signs of the foulness, etc., are not complexion of pleasure owing to the signs of foulness, etc.; and for the sake of the signs of beauty there;
ai-tika-s0304t5:5_5: gives the full admission to a woman who is not fully ordained. ...
ai-tika-s0304t5:5_6: Wandering in this way, they do not show the path to absorption, as long as they reach absorption, the signless immersion of the heart, ...
ai-tika-s0304t5:5_7: the discerning of conditions, associated with knowledge,
ai-tika-s0304t5:5_9: The fruition have attained concentration through the first path and the fruition which is the concentration attained.
ai-tika-s0304t5:6_0: The Book of the Signs is finished.
ai-tika-s0304t5:8_0: Knowing the origin of the path, conversion of flatterers, and gains confidence in those without it.
ai-tika-s0304t5:8_1: But he said, “Noble Ladies, without even a conversion of confidence.”
ai-tika-s0304t5:8_2: having the power of merit for oneself,
ai-tika-s0304t5:9_0: The Assembly of Sakka is finished.
ai-tika-s0304t5:10_0: The Linked Discourses on Moggallāna is finished.
